WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

CompanyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CompanyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CompanyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Import_Worker_SSP_Work_Schedule_Calendar.description: Effective Date on which the Worker SSP Work Schedule Calendar becomes effective.

SSP_Work_Schedule_CalendarObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

SSP_Work_Schedule_CalendarObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

SSP_Work_Schedule_CalendarObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Import_Worker_SSP_Work_Schedule_Calendar.description: SSP Work Schedule Calendar to apply as of the Effective Date for the specified Worker and Company.
Apply Global SSP Work Schedule Calendar Rule as of the Effective Date for the specified Worker and Company.

description: Request element for Import Worker SSP Work Schedule Calendar (WS Background Process).

validation.validation: [worker] for [company] already has an effective Worker SSP Work Schedule Calendar on [date].
You can't have 2 Worker SSP Work Schedule Calendars effective for [worker] in [company] on [date].
